problem_text_cn: 如图,AB为⊙O的直径,C为⊙O上一点,弦AD平分∠BAC,交BC于点E,AB=6,AD=5,则DE的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, C is the point on ⊙O, chord AD bisects ∠BAC, intersects BC at point E, AB = N_0, AD = N_1, then the length of DE is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图1,连接BD、CD,∵AB为⊙O的直径,∴∠ADB=90°,∴BD=√{AB²-AD²}=√{6²-5²}=√{11},∵弦AD平分∠BAC,∴CD=BD=√{11},∴∠CBD=∠DAB,在△ABD和△BED中,≥ft\{\begin{matrix}∠BAD=∠EBD\\∠ADB=∠BDE\\\end{matrix}\right.\∴△ABD∽△BED,∴\frac{DE}{DB}=\frac{DB}{AD},即\frac{DE}{√{11}}=\frac{√{11}}{5},解得DE=\frac{11}{5}．故选:A．
